"DigitalOcean - it`s cloud infrastructure for made simple, scalable, and affordable projects."

🌐 1. Droplets (Virtual Machines)

💻 What it is: Cloud-based VPS (Virtual Private Servers).

🚀 Use cases: Hosting websites, applications, databases, dev environments.

🧰 Key features: Fast provisioning, scalability, choice of OS (Ubuntu, Debian, CentOS, etc.).

☁️ 2. App Platform

🔧 What it is: Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS) for automatic app deployment.

📦 Use cases: Deploy from GitHub or GitLab; supports Node.js, Python, PHP, Go, Static sites.

⚙️ Key features: Autoscaling, HTTPS, built-in CI/CD with zero infrastructure setup.

🗄️ 3. Managed Databases

🧠 What it is: Fully managed database hosting.

🛢️ Supported databases: PostgreSQL, MySQL, Redis, MongoDB, and more.

🔄 Key features: Backups, replication, automatic updates, and scaling.
